"Telepipes":
"Telepipes are warp devices used to move the player. It connects the Campship to the field.

It's useful for rendezvousing afterward with other participating members. "

"Telepipes

Telepipes are consumable items that allow you to travel to and from the campship at a set spot on the map. This is useful for allowing players joining your party to quickly catch up to you.

※ You cannot take the Telepipe of another party.
※ Your party may have only one active telepipe at any time."
